articles.author: Patrick Wintour
articles.title: Macron stands by divisive remark about US allies 'not being vassals' - The Guardian
articles.description: French president reaffirms Sunday’s call for Europe to act more independently from US over China and Taiwan
articles.content:
Emmanuel Macron has stood by his controversial comments on Taiwan, repeating that being a US ally did not mean being a vassal.
At the end of a state visit to the Netherlands during which he has also… [+5705 chars]

articles.author: The Economist
articles.title: The hunt for life on Jupiter's icy moons - The Economist
articles.description: Our podcast on science and technology. This week, our second episode on the hunt for life elsewhere—exploring the European Space Agency’s JUICE mission
articles.content: ON APRIL 13TH, the European Space Agency will launch a spacecraft towards Jupiter and three of its icy moonsGanymede, Europa and Callisto. The JUICE mission will carry ten instruments to the outer so… [+1357 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: France favours 'status quo' on Taiwan, position unchanged, says prez Macron - Hindustan Times
articles.description: "French and European position on Taiwan is the same one. We're in favour of the status quo. This policy is constant and hasn't changed," President Macron said. | World News
articles.content: President Emmanuel Macron said France's position on Taiwan had not changed and that he favoured the current "status quo" in respect of the island, after he was asked to clarify comments that prompted… [+2846 chars]
